triceratops.name: Triceratops
triceratops.description: The Cretaceous version of the black rhino. The horns make great wall ornaments.

t-rex.name: T-rex
t-rex.description: It's tiny arms can't reach anything, anywhere.

brontosaurus.name: Brontosaurus
brontosaurus.description: The Brontosaurus never existed. It was an Apatosaurus all along!

velociraptor.name: Velociraptor
velociraptor.description: Vulnerable to being controlled by Chris Pratt.

pterodactyl.name: Pterodactyl
pterodactyl.description: This isn't actually a dinosaur. It's a pterosaur.

dilophosaurus.name: Dilophosaurus
dilophosaurus.description: The tumor on the head is a sure sign Dilosphosaurus is going down.

spinosaurus.name: Spinosaurus
spinosaurus.description: This one will just sail away.

dragon.name: Dragon
dragon.description: This creature didn't even exist in the first place.
